STORIES

Action Against Hunger provides lifesaving assistance and restores self-sufficiency to over 9 million people in 45 countries.

Nutrition

Global hunger now afflicts nearly a billion people worldwide.
We have over 5,000 field staff who assist more than 9 million people each year, and over 30 years of experience saving lives during conflict, disasters, and food crises. Our global team is on the ground in 45 countries, and we want you to be part of it. Help us provide lifesaving nutritional care, food security, and clean water to those who need them most by making your tax-deductible gift today. Select an Amount
